A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The highlight of this visually stunning\, probably divisive but unconventional middle chapter is without any doubts the mesmerizing relationship between the hero and the villain. Rian Johnson takes what was great about the Luke/Vader and Anakin/Obi-Wan dynamics to new heights. As the Light and the Darkness inevitably attract each other\, so do Rey and Kylo\, whose strange connection moves in unpredictable directions and sets the tone of the entire movie.
